name: jsvm
description: Pure ECMAScript 5 implementation of the Node.js VM API

scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && typings install && npm run dist
scripts.test: npm run build && node node_modules/tape/bin/tape test/*.js
scripts.dist: npm run build && webpack jsvm.js jsvm.min.js && babili -s --no-comments --compact true jsvm.min.js -o jsvm.min.js

author: Filip Dal√ºge <daluege@gmail.com>
